body:
Squeakers: Hi! I brought you something. It's one of my sculptures. It kind of looks like your zapper dial. I thought you might like it, as a way to remember me when I'm gone.
[[Thank you, this is really nice.|Thankful]]
[[This is... weird.|Oh]]

title: Thankful
body:
Don't mention it! I'm glad you like it. I spent a lot of time on that one. It would have been easier with thumbs, though. Time to run!
[[1-4]]

title: Oh
body:
I'm sorry, I wasn't sure of if you'd like it or not. I just wanted to say thank you for how nice you've been.
[[1-4]]

Hey, I know this is weird, but I don't want to die. Do you think maybe you could.... you know, help me out somehow at the end of this?
[[Of course, I hate this job anyway!|EndConvoElope]]
[[Don't worry, I'll help you escape.|EndConvoEscape]]
[[I don't think I can do that.|EndConvoDeath]]

I know we haven't been on the best terms, but I wanted to know if you could help me out after this exeperiment ends? I really don't want to die.
[[No, I can't, sorry.|EndConvoDeath]]
[[Maybe I can help you escpae...|EndConvoEscape]]

Look, when you kill me later on, just do it quickly.
[[Hey, I'm sorry about how I've treated you. I'm just trying to do my job.|Whatever]]
[[" ... "|EndConvoDeath]]
[[I look forward to it.|EndConvoDeath]]

title: Whatever
body:
Yeah, I guess it's... just a part of life, isn't it? Doing our jobs and all that. I'm still going to die because of you, though...
[[EndConvoDeath]]
